description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Akujin is a classic top down shoot-em-up featuring ever evolving and challenging game play.  Fight against a myriad of enemies across 6 levels of intense action as you push the aliens back to their own galaxy.  Three difficulty settings ensure a challenging game experience for any players’ level of skill.  Employ four types of basic fire as well as missiles, shields and special attacks.
